message:
I've made the following changes to add source filtering functionality:

1. Added a fixed position filter bar at the top of the page with checkboxes for each source type (user, agent, environment)
2. Added padding to the body to account for the fixed filter bar
3. Added styles for the filter bar and its components
4. Added JavaScript functions to handle filtering:
   - `getVisibleSources()`: Gets the list of currently checked source types
   - `updateVisibility()`: Updates the visibility of events based on the checked sources
   - Added event listeners for the filter checkboxes
5. Modified the `loadConversation()` function to store the current conversation and update visibility after loading

The filter bar will remain visible at the top of the page regardless of scroll position, and users can toggle the visibility of each source type independently by clicking the checkboxes. All sources are visible by default (checkboxes are checked).

Would you like me to make any adjustments to this implementation?

args.content:
I've made the following changes to add source filtering functionality:

1. Added a fixed position filter bar at the top of the page with checkboxes for each source type (user, agent, environment)
2. Added padding to the body to account for the fixed filter bar
3. Added styles for the filter bar and its components
4. Added JavaScript functions to handle filtering:
   - `getVisibleSources()`: Gets the list of currently checked source types
   - `updateVisibility()`: Updates the visibility of events based on the checked sources
   - Added event listeners for the filter checkboxes
5. Modified the `loadConversation()` function to store the current conversation and update visibility after loading

The filter bar will remain visible at the top of the page regardless of scroll position, and users can toggle the visibility of each source type independently by clicking the checkboxes. All sources are visible by default (checkboxes are checked).

Would you like me to make any adjustments to this implementation?

curl -X POST "https://api.github.com/repos/lyndsysimon/openhands-conversation-viewer/pulls" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer $GITHUB_TOKEN" \
    -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
    -d '{
        "title": "Add source filtering functionality",
        "body": "This PR adds the ability to filter conversation events based on their source (user, agent, environment). Features:\n\n- Fixed position filter bar at the top of the page\n- Independent toggle for each source type\n- Checkboxes with visual indicators matching the source colors\n- Real-time filtering without page reload\n- All sources visible by default",
        "head": "add-source-filtering",
        "base": "main",
        "draft": true
    }'

message:
I've created a draft pull request with the source filtering functionality. You can view and review the changes at:
https://github.com/lyndsysimon/openhands-conversation-viewer/pull/1

The PR adds:
- Fixed position filter bar at the top of the page
- Independent toggle for each source type
- Checkboxes with visual indicators matching the source colors
- Real-time filtering without page reload
- All sources visible by default

Would you like me to make any adjustments to the implementation?
